explains: v. 在……之前发生（或出现）；走在……前面（precede 的现在分词形式）

sentences.en: As we saw in the preceding chapter, groups can be powerful agents of socialization.
sentences.cn: 如我们在前一章所见，团组可以是社会化的有力动因。

sentences.en: She informed us that eighteen members of the staff had left during the preceding year.
sentences.cn: 她当时告知我们，18位教职员在此前的一年里离开了。

sentences.en: We shall be known better than any preceding generations.
sentences.cn: 我们将比前几代人更出名。
